con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="4LTR Course Metadata_Services TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value="/Applications/SoapUI-5.0.0.app/Contents/java/app/bin"/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="true"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value="/Users/mindtap/SOAPUI/Reports"/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value="http://10.172.253.230:8181"/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
import jxl.*
def NumOfXLSRows
def XLPath = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("XLPath")
log.info ("Path : " + XLPath)
Workbook objWB = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(XLPath))
Sheet objSheet = objWB.getSheet(0)
NumOfXLSRows = objSheet.getRows()
log.info ("Number of TZ_Xls rows: " + NumOfXLSRows)
cdft_cgi = objSheet.getCell(2,4).getContents() c_cgi = objSheet.getCell(2,12).getContents() type_id = objSheet.getCell(2,25).getContents()
log.info("Course Cgi for: " + cdft_cgi) log.info("Chapter Cgi: " + c_cgi) log.info("Metadata Type: " + type_id)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("cdft_cgi", cdft_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("c_cgi", c_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("type_id", type_id) //testRunner.runTestStepByName("Course Flat view") objWB.close()

import jxl.*
def NumOfXLSRows

cdft_cgi = objSheet.getCell(2,4).getContents() c_cgi = objSheet.getCell(2,12).getContents() type_id = objSheet.getCell(2,26).getContents()
log.info("Course Cgi for: " + cdft_cgi) log.info("Chapter Cgi: " + c_cgi) log.info("Metadata Type: " + type_id)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("cdft_cgi", cdft_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("c_cgi", c_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("type_id", type_id) //testRunner.runTestStepByName("Course Flat view") objWB.close()

import jxl.*
def NumOfXLSRows
def XLPath = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("XLPath")

Workbook objWB = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(XLPath))

log.info ("Number of TZ_Xls rows: " + NumOfXLSRows)
cdft_cgi = objSheet.getCell(2,4).getContents() c_cgi = objSheet.getCell(3,30).getContents() c_cgi1 = objSheet.getCell(4,30).getContents()
log.info("Course Cgi for: " + cdft_cgi) log.info("Chapter Cgi: " + c_cgi) log.info("Sub-Chapter Cgi: " + c_cgi1)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("cdft_cgi", cdft_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("c_cgi", c_cgi) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("c_cgi1", c_cgi1)
//testRunner.runTestStepByName("Course Flat view") objWB.close()

con:configuration.scriptText: log.info(" API_URL: "+ messageExchange.getEndpoint()) log.info(" Timetaken/SLA: "+ messageExchange.getTimeTaken() + " ms")

con:config.script:
import jxl.*
def NumOfXLSRows
def XLPath = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue("XLPath")
log.info ("Path : " + XLPath)
Workbook objWB = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(XLPath))
Sheet objSheet = objWB.getSheet(0)
NumOfXLSRows = objSheet.getRows()
log.info ("Number of TZ_Xls rows: " + NumOfXLSRows)
narr_id = objSheet.getCell(2,18).getContents()
log.info("Narrative ID: " + narr_id)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("narr_id", narr_id) //testRunner.runTestStepByName("Course Flat view") objWB.close()
